rewrite1:
Please take the selected text and make the following adjustments:

1. Change the outline level to Level 5.
2. Increase the font size to 36 points.
3. Align the text to the right.
4. Set the line spacing to Multiple, specifically 3 lines.
5. Highlight the text with a yellow color.
6. Modify the left indent, setting it to 2 centimeters.
7. Switch the font to Times New Roman.
8. Italicize the text.
9. Apply a blue color to the font.

Ensure that all these changes are applied while maintaining the original meaning and purpose of the text.
